name: The Company (wilsk)
description:
Its June 1883, and you have inherited your father's shipping company.  Keep the company running and avoid bankruptcy for as long as possible!

Made for the Bevy Game Jam 2 

All assets except the rain sounds were made by me during the jam. The code is  available here https://github.com/will-hart/bevy_jam_2. 

NOTE: I have only tested Windows and web builds.
